remarks: The derivative of the conjugate of a function.  For the (more general) relation version, see ~ dvcjbr .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2015.)
statement: dvcj $p |- ( ( F : X --> CC /\ X C_ RR ) -> ( RR _D ( * o. F ) ) = ( * o. ( RR _D F ) ) ) $.
